EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Society Newsletter - Easter 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Happy Easter, {!Contact.FirstName}!
This month's newsletter features some of the great opportunities on offer to NCS graduates in your area through The Challenge Society.
For even more opportunities, check out your local TCS website, Facebook and Twitter pages. Opportunities vary from volunteering to skills workshops, work experience, and even paid roles!
Remember...
Volunteer with other NCS grads this Easter!
If you live in Waltham Forest, Newham or Redbridge, why not come along to help out NCS graduates on the Reaching Communities programme run their amazing social action event!
Meet up with NCS mates, keep that Action Day buzz going and do some great work in your community!
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS - http://tcsnorthlondon.co.uk/listings/two-day-volunteering-opportunity-ne-london/
Create a business plan with Lloyds Banking Group!
The Challenge Society is teaming up with Business in the Community and Lloyds Banking Group to provide some amazing employability workshops to NCS grads in North East London.
On the morning of Friday 8th April, we'll be focussing on how you can turn your ideas into a money-making business.
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS - https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/business-plan-workshop-with-lloyds-banking-group-tickets-24283118461
Stress management & revision workshop
On the afternoon of Friday 8th April, The Challenge Society is offering NCS grads a day of revision help and stress-busting in the run up to exams. There'll be a variety of interactive workshops, stalls, and 1-2-1 and group activities to help with revision techniques, time management, and staying calm.
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS - http://tcsnorthlondon.co.uk/listings/stress-management-and-revision-workshop-2/
Over 18? Come work for NCS!
Nobody knows the impact of NCS like you do, and now it’s your chance to pass that experience on. Gain great experience for your CV, push yourself as a person, and give something back – all at the same time. We have over 4,500 paid seasonal roles to fill in 2016, and we’d love you to get involved.
CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS - http://tcsnorthlondon.co.uk/listings/missing-ncs-continue-your-journey-and-come-work-for-us/
